<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fighter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5081) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 219 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Fighter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=214)

**Prerequisites**
Strength +2; Dexterity +2

</column>

---

You become trained in martial weapons. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You become trained in fighter class DC.

<title level="2">Fighter Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Maneuver](/Feats.aspx?ID=5082), [Diverse Weapon Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=5086), [Fighter Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=5083), [Reactive Striker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5084)
name: Fighter Dedication
